character.selfSummonInstructions:
Please enter your character information in the following format:

%%%! CHARACTER
Name: Your Name
Title: He/She/They/etc
Description: Your character description. Make sure to include your name and weapon.
%%%

Then summon yourself by typing %summon Your Name%.
search.fail: {{actor.name}} searched the {{room}} for shards, but found nothing.
search.foundItems: {{actor.name}} searched the {{room}}. {{actor.name}} found some useful items, but no shards.
